FuncDef: The display sm2 peer-public-key command displays information about remote SM2 public keys.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays brief information about all remote SM2 public keys.
-

Displays information about the remote SM2 public key with a specified name.
The value is a string of 1 to 40 case-insensitive characters, spaces not supported. The string can contain only letters, digits, and underscores (_).

ExtraInfo: To display information about the public key in the SM2 key pair configured on the remote end connected to the local device functioning as a client, run the display sm2 peer-public-key command. The public key enables the server to authenticate users and permits the login requests of authorized users.
